      • BreakExecutionOfAllScriptsWithCommands

        public static void BreakExecutionOfAllScriptsWithCommands(boolean doStop)

        script stop/resume commands

        Section Content

        Other Paragraph

        Stop All allows to stop execution of any scipt currently running that calls the tick() function which allows the gameloop to regain control of the game and process user commands. Typing script stop would make sure that all the scripts will stop their execution. Execution will be halted until script resume is called
